translation.en: Can I get a pack of Morley's?
translation.zh: 能给我一包默尔里牌香烟吗？

translation.en: Sí, sí.
[in English] Yeah.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Giselle?
translation.zh: 真心话大冒险 吉赛尔？

translation.en: Please, I don't wanna play anymore. Please.
translation.zh: 拜托你 我不想玩了 求求你

translation.en: -Truth or dare? -[gasps]
No, no! No!
I'm sorry. I don't have a choice.
[Olivia] You do have a choice.
And I can honestly say,
the pure joy you will feel from literally building someone's home,
translation.zh: 携手建立他人家园 所得到的快乐…

translation.en: it will stay with you for the rest of your life,
unlike all the nights you won't remember
translation.zh: 这有别于那些 你不记得是如何度过的夜晚…

translation.en: and the hangovers you're really gonna want to forget.
translation.zh: 还有那难受的宿醉感受

translation.en: So, for a spring break alternative that is really good for the soul,
translation.zh: 你若想体验有益身心 健康的春假…

translation.en: please consider Habitat for Humanity.
translation.zh: 请考虑参加“人类栖息地”

translation.en: Okay.
Hey!
Hi!
So I've been doing some thinking, and I forgive you.
translation.zh: 我仔细想后决定原谅你

translation.en: For what?
For saying you can't come on spring break. I know you didn't mean it.
translation.zh: 你说过不能和我们一同度过春假 但我知道你不是认真的

translation.en: -[sighs] Markie. -Yeah.
I love you so much. You know that.
translation.zh: 我很爱你 你是知道的

translation.en: But I can't. I already signed up for Habitat.
translation.zh: 但我真的不能去 我已经报名参加“栖息地”

translation.en: -I know. -Yeah, I'm a trip leader.
translation.zh: -我知道 -我还是这趟旅行的领导人

translation.en: No, I know. I know. It's just...
This is our last spring break. Ever.
translation.zh: 这是我们最后一次春假

translation.en: And the thought of doing that without my best friend?
translation.zh: 我一想到不能与最好的朋友一同度过

translation.en: -That breaks my heart. -[scoffs]
Since high school, you and I haven't spent more than a week away from each other.
translation.zh: 我们自高中起 就不曾离开彼此超过一周

translation.en: This is our last chance to have some fun
translation.zh: 这会是我们最后一次享乐…

translation.en: before life tears us apart.
-I mean, when you put it that way... -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你既然这么说… 是的

translation.en: No, still can't.
Okay. Olivia, whatever happened to "Between you and the world, I choose you"?
translation.zh: 奥利维亚 你不是曾说过 “在你和世界之间 我会选择你”

translation.en: -I still mean that. -Do you?
Yes, most of the time. This just, you know, isn't one of those times.
translation.zh: 大多时候是的 但这次不算

translation.en: Okay, all right.
You know, I really didn't wanna have to do this, but you've left me no other choice.
translation.zh: 我真的不想这么做 但你让我别无选择

translation.en: I unsigned you up.
-You what? -Yeah.
I told Habitat you got shingles,
translation.zh: 我通知“栖息地”你长了带状疱疹

translation.en: which is kind of funny because roofs have shingles and--
translation.zh: 这很有趣 因为这 也能用来比喻屋顶木瓦…

translation.en: -Markie, that is so-- -Brilliant.
translation.zh: -玛琪 你这么做真是… -太好了

translation.en: Thank you!
[Penelope] Okay, if you come with us for this one week of spring break debauchery,
translation.zh: 好的 你要是跟我们 度过一周放荡的春假…

translation.en: we will all build houses with you for two weeks over the summer.
translation.zh: 我们所有人会在暑假两周 跟你一同去建房子

translation.en: We said one week.
We said two. It'll help with your med school applications.
translation.zh: 我们说过是两周 这也有益于你医学院的申请

translation.en: Like I need the help.
translation.zh: 说得好似我需要这点帮忙

translation.en: He's in, full 14 days.
translation.zh: 他答应了 一共十四天

translation.en: [Markie] So what's it going to be, Liv?
translation.zh: 你的选择是什么 奥利维亚？

translation.en: I mean, your feeble set of hands for one week or all of ours for two?
translation.zh: 你无力双手的一周努力 或是我们所有人两周的帮忙？

translation.en: I mean, you're really just being selfish if you don't come with us.
translation.zh: 你若还不同意就太自私了

translation.en: Oh, my God!
[Tyson grunts] What did you put in here?
-[girls laughing] -Shoes.
-It worked? -Well, that depends.
Are you really gonna help me build houses this summer?
translation.zh: 你真的会在这暑假 跟我一同搭建房子？

translation.en: You had me at "boys with tools."
translation.zh: 你一提到“工具男”我就被说服了

translation.en: And Markie's nothing if not persistent.
Yup, that is her most annoying quality.
translation.zh: 没错 她这一点最讨人厌

translation.en: Glad you're with us, Girl Scout.
translation.zh: 你能跟我们一同上路真好 女童子军

translation.en: Well, you know we've always been a package deal.
translation.zh: 你不是不知道我们形影不离

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I'm well aware of that.
translation.zh: 是的 我有意识到这一点

translation.en: -Are you? [chuckles] -Yeah. I'm okay with it.
translation.zh: -有吗？ -是的 我对此没意见

translation.en: -You ready? -So ready.
Okay, let's go.
Let's do it.
-Do we have everything? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 一切都带齐了？ 是的

translation.en: Now we do.
Ooh, ooh! Spring break, bitches!
translation.zh: 春假开始了 婊子们！

translation.en: -[Lucas] That's right, bitches! -[all whooping]
[Lucas] There it is! We're in Mexico.
-Rosarito! Spring break! -Spring break!
translation.zh: （成功抵达！） -罗萨里托！春假！ -春假！

translation.en: Who's ready for some cervezas?
translation.zh: 有谁准备好去喝西班牙啤酒了？

translation.en: -Margaritas! -Actually, this is like our fourth.
translation.zh: -玛格丽塔！ -这其实是我们的第四杯

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you!
[Lucas] Such a babe. My God. [Olivia] What about me?
translation.zh: -真是个美女 天啊 -我呢？ （最佳宿醉良药！）

translation.en: Mexico!
Tyson is about to run into the water and get eaten by a shark.
translation.zh: 泰森即将冲向大海被鲨鱼吃掉

translation.en: [Lucas] Beer run, let's go!
-[camera continues clicking] -We're not drunk yet.
Are you straight? Are you straight? Are you straight?
All poles, no holes, you know that.
translation.zh: 你是否是直男？ 全是棍 没有洞 你懂的

translation.en: Lonely souls here at the bar.
translation.zh: （最好的朋友） 在酒吧里的寂寞人儿

translation.en: Drink, drink!
Sand dollar! Lucky charm.
translation.zh: 沙钱海胆！ 这可是幸运物

translation.en: Sober friend right here.
[Tyson] There, there. Yeah! Oh, shit!
[Markie] I love this.
If you guys watch this later, I love you, Markie.
translation.zh: 你们若之后看到这段视频 我爱你 玛琪

translation.en: Love you, Liv.
Love you, Pen. Love you, Brad. I love you, Ty.
translation.zh: 爱你佩内 爱你布拉德 爱你泰森

translation.en: Let's leave these losers behind. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们撇下这些废柴 走吧

translation.en: [Markie] I just want to go to one more bar.
translation.zh: 不 我还想再去一家酒吧

translation.en: Olé!
Olé!
Oh, I wanna lay you! Let's go back to the hotel. Come on.
translation.zh: 哦 我好想跟你亲热！ 我们回酒店去吧

translation.en: Wow. [laughs]
They are really going for it.
Well, if you can't beat 'em...
translation.zh: 这个嘛 要是无法击败他们…

translation.en: Just like that?
Okay, tell me what's going on.
translation.zh: 好的 说说看现在的状况

translation.en: Uh, last night in Mexico. And...
translation.zh: 这是在墨西哥的最后一夜…

translation.en: And we're the only two losers not dancing.
translation.zh: 此时此刻只有我们俩没去跳舞

translation.en: Mmm. If you can call that dancing.
translation.zh: 如果那称得上是跳舞的话

translation.en: Definitely not.
Is that for your YouTube channel?
translation.zh: 这段视频是要 上传到你的油管频道吗？

translation.en: No, no. YouTube's for my volunteer stuff, and Snapchats are just for fun.
translation.zh: 不是的 那个频道只用来记录 我做的义工 “快照”是用来玩的

translation.en: Um, I'm gonna go to the senoritas'. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我去一下厕所 很快就回来

translation.en: Come on.
Hey, I thought you were done with this shit.
translation.zh: 嘿 我以为你已经停止这种行为

translation.en: You're moving in with Lucas, to DC, remember?
translation.zh: 你就要跟卢卡斯一同搬去华盛顿了 记得吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah. -What are you doing?
I'm sorry. I'm so stupid.
I'm just drunk, okay? You're seriously the best friend ever.
translation.zh: 我喝醉了 你真是我最好的朋友

translation.en: -You good? -[sniffles] Okay. Yeah.
Look who I found, trying and failing to salsa.
translation.zh: 看我找到了谁 想要跳莎莎舞却失败了

translation.en: -Cool. -I wasn't that bad.
-Hey. -Hey.
-I missed you. Welcome back. -I missed you.
translation.zh: -我好想你 欢迎回来 -我也想你

translation.en: [Markie] I missed you, too.
Olivia! What?
Ronnie? Hi. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 罗尼？嗨 你怎么会在这里？

translation.en: Oh, I'm just skiing. What do you think I'm doing here?
translation.zh: 哦 我是来滑雪的 你说呢？

translation.en: I'm getting my spring break on. Do you wanna join me?
translation.zh: 我来这里度春假 你要跟我一起吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] No. Thanks.
Hey, where's Markie? Maybe we could do, like, you know, a little ménage à trois?
translation.zh: 嘿 玛琪呢？ 我们或许能来个三人行？

translation.en: You know what? She's actually with her boyfriend. Lucas.
translation.zh: 她跟男友卢卡斯一起来的

translation.en: What about, like, a ménage à dos?
translation.zh: 那我们不如来个双人行吧？

translation.en: -It's just... -[man] Not happening, pal.
translation.zh: 你想得美 这位仁兄

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Is there a problem, pal?
translation.zh: 是吗？你有什么意见吗 兄弟？

translation.en: No. Just surprised she hasn't punched you in the face yet.
translation.zh: 没什么 我只是很惊讶 她还没揍你一拳

translation.en: Guess she's nicer than I am.
Oh, yeah? How about I punch you in the face? Huh?
translation.zh: 是吗？不如我来揍你一拳吧？

translation.en: Wouldn't be the worst thing that's happened to me this week.
translation.zh: 这不会是我这周内发生过最惨的事

translation.en: Okay, Ronnie, calm down. Seriously, you gotta let it go. All right?
translation.zh: 罗尼 冷静下来 别这样 行吗？

translation.en: I saw Delta Phi in the back. They're doing shots.
translation.zh: 我在后头看到德尔塔费兄弟会在灌酒

translation.en: So you should really go check it out.
I can't say no to shots. Everyone knows that.
translation.zh: 我无法抗拒灌酒 这是众所皆知的

translation.en: That's why I'm gonna leave. Not 'cause of what you said.
translation.zh: 我是为了这个原因才要离开 不是因为你说的话

translation.en: You think I'm too nice?
It's a good thing. Except when dealing with guys at bars, so...
translation.zh: 这是件好事 除非是用来对付酒吧里的男人…

translation.en: Feel free to tell me to piss off.
translation.zh: 你随时可以叫我滚远点

translation.en: Maybe I just like being nice.
translation.zh: 我或许喜欢当个善良的人

translation.en: Can I give it a shot?
I'm Carter.
Olivia.
-Buy you a drink? -Yeah.
Another beer, and a margarita for the lady.
translation.zh: 再来一个啤酒 也给这位女士一杯玛格丽塔

translation.en: Come on! There's gotta be an all-night bar around here somewhere.
translation.zh: 走吧！这里肯定有通宵营业的酒吧

translation.en: We still have that tequila back in the room.
translation.zh: 我们房里还有一瓶龙舌兰酒

translation.en: But it's our last night in Mexico. I don't wanna go back to the room.
translation.zh: 这是我们在墨西哥的最后一夜 我不想在房里度过

translation.en: I know a place we can go.
I'm sorry. Who are you?
It's a bit of a hike, but it's worth it. Hmm.
translation.zh: 离这里有些距离 但很值得一去

translation.en: Or you can just tell me to piss off.
translation.zh: 或者你也可以叫我滚远点

translation.en: I think the hotel room sounds pretty good. Yeah.
translation.zh: 回酒店房间的提议听起来很不错

translation.en: Oh, come on. It's our final spring break.
translation.zh: 来吧 这是我们最后一个春假

translation.en: "Before life tears us apart."
Right.
[Carter] We're almost there.
[Tyson] I should have worn my hiking shoes.
[Markie] Um, okay.
[Tyson] Should I lay down some bread crumbs?
translation.zh: 我应该留下面包屑做记号吗？

translation.en: [Olivia] Wait, guys. Be careful.
translation.zh: 等等 各位 小心点 （严禁擅自进入）

translation.en: I wonder what that means.
How's your Spanish, Brad?
translation.zh: 你的西班牙语怎么样 布拉德？

translation.en: Come on, guys, let's go!
[Olivia] Wow. This place is interesting.
translation.zh: 哇 这地方真有意思

translation.en: Kind of terrifying.
There's nothing to be afraid of. Promise.
translation.zh: 这里没什么好怕的 我向你保证

translation.en: [Tyson] Yeah, this is way better than a club.
translation.zh: 是啊 这里真是比夜店热闹多了

translation.en: Hey. You okay?
Uh, yeah. Yeah.
Just a little tired.
[Markie] Yeah. We won't stay long.
translation.zh: 好的 我们只逗留一下就走

translation.en: [Penelope] Where's the tequila?
Hope you've had your tetanus shot.
translation.zh: 希望各位都有注射破伤风预防针

translation.en: I gotta piss.
Whoa! Oh! Chill out, O-dog. It's just me.
translation.zh: 放轻松 奥利宝贝 是我

translation.en: Ronnie, did you follow me here?
translation.zh: 罗尼 你跟踪我到这里？

translation.en: You can't keep Ron-Ron from a party.
translation.zh: 有什么好玩事都少不了罗尼

translation.en: What the hell?
[sniffs] This smells horrible. What is it? What?
Yo, beer me, bro.
translation.zh: 嘿 给我啤酒 兄弟

translation.en: Oh, great, Ronnie's here.
translation.zh: 真棒 罗尼也跟着来了

translation.en: Sure thing, bro.
You know, we gotta get up early, so...
translation.zh: 你知道的 我们明天得早起 所以…

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah. Yeah.
[Carter] You guys just got here.
You can't leave now.
translation.zh: 你们现在不能离开 对啊 不用这么急着走吧 各位？

translation.en: Yeah. What's the rush?
translation.zh: 对啊 不用这么急着走吧 各位？

translation.en: Yeah. Let's, uh... Let's play a game or something.
Oh, yeah. Like spin the bottle.
translation.zh: 好啊 像是旋转瓶子游戏

translation.en: And on that note, let's, uh...
I was thinking truth or dare.
translation.zh: 我想玩的是真心话大冒险

translation.en: What, this a seventh grade sleepover or...
translation.zh: 搞什么 小学生在玩家家酒吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] I know it's a kids' game, but, I mean, if you play it right,
translation.zh: 我知道这是个幼稚的游戏 但若用对方式…

translation.en: it's a chance to expose your friends' deepest secrets.
translation.zh: 就能揭发朋友之间最黑暗的秘密

translation.en: Make 'em do things they don't want to.
translation.zh: 也能让他们做出不想做的事

translation.en: That actually does sound kind of interesting.
Great. We're in.
translation.zh: 好极了 我们开始吧

translation.en: Okay, everybody, get behind me.
translation.zh: 好的 大家围在我身后

translation.en: -And, one, two, three. -[Brad] Smile!
-Queso! -Yo, will you tag me in that?
translation.zh: 记得上传后在网上标记我

translation.en: [Brad sighs] Glad you're with us, Ronnie.
translation.zh: 与你同行真是愉快 罗尼

translation.en: Well?
Olivia. Truth or dare?
translation.zh: 奥利维亚 真心话还是大冒险？

translation.en: -Truth. -Lame.
-Aliens. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 要是来了外星人 它们的飞船在这里降落 逼你做出选择

translation.en: They land right now, and they give you a choice.
translation.zh: 它们的飞船在这里降落 逼你做出选择

translation.en: They kill everyone in this room and then leave peacefully,
translation.zh: 杀掉这房里所有人 接着和平离去…

translation.en: or they kill the entire population of Mexico,
translation.zh: 或杀掉墨西哥所有人口…

translation.en: but we escape unscathed. Choose.
translation.zh: 但我们安然无恙 你得做出选择

translation.en: What kind of ridiculous question is that?
[chuckles] It's a moral dilemma.
-I don't have morals. -Of course you don't.
translation.zh: -我没有道德可言 -你当然没有

translation.en: Okay, well, obviously, she's choosing us.
translation.zh: 好的 她很显然会选择救我们

translation.en: -Sorry, guys. -What?
translation.zh: 抱歉了 各位 什么？

translation.en: [gasps] You're gonna let aliens kill us?
translation.zh: 你会让外星人杀死我们？

translation.en: I love you, but millions of people? Come on.
translation.zh: 我很爱你们 但关系到上百万条人命？拜托

translation.en: You have to tell the truth.
I am. It's the only right answer.
translation.zh: 我说了 这是正确的答案

translation.en: [Penelope] Ah, whatever.
Well, I'm bored of this already, so let's get this party started.
translation.zh: 我已经感到无聊了 我们开始狂欢吧

translation.en: -You brought us here. -[Brad chuckles] Ooh!
translation.zh: 是你把我们带来这里的

translation.en: Yo, I know how to amp this up a little bit.
translation.zh: 嘿 我知道要如何调动气氛

translation.en: Why don't we get a little girl-on-girl going?
translation.zh: 我们不如来些女对女的亲热？

translation.en: -No. -Ronnie.
-I'd watch that. -Truth or dare?
translation.zh: -我会很乐意观赏 -真心话还是大冒险？

translation.en: Dare. Duh.
translation.zh: 大冒险 这还用问吗？

translation.en: I dare you to give Tyson a lap dance for 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 我向你挑战给泰森跳三十秒的艳舞

translation.en: -No way! No. -Yep.
-I won't do it. -Once you're asked, you're in.
translation.zh: -好啊 -我才不会这么干 你一旦被问及就得 加入游戏 这是游戏规则

translation.en: It's the rules.
translation.zh: 你一旦被问及就得 加入游戏 这是游戏规则

translation.en: There's, like, three chicks here. You couldn't dare...
translation.zh: 这里有三个女生 你就不能挑战别的…

translation.en: -This sucks! So wack! -Get over here.
-[Tyson] Just do it. -Get it.
-[Penelope] Take it off. -No tips, no touching, bro.
translation.zh: -快脱衣 -不用打赏也别想乱摸 兄弟

translation.en: Don't make this a thing.
-Hold this. -Don't make this weird.
This is gonna be the longest 30 seconds of my life. Let's go. Come on.
translation.zh: 这会是我人生中 最漫长的三十秒 来吧

translation.en: -Whoo! Take it off. -All right.
[Brad] He's done this before.
[Markie] I think he kind of likes it.
[Lucas] We got a real pro here.
[Brad] Look at that technique.
-[Penelope] Ooh! Look at that. -[Lucas] Ronnie! Ronnie!
[Brad] He's done this before. Look at that.
translation.zh: 这肯定不是他的第一次 看看吧

translation.en: Make it rain pesos.
translation.zh: 想要赚取比索就卖力跳吧

translation.en: I don't want your pesos.
[Tyson] Aww. Cheer up.
Okay, all right. Lucas? Truth or dare?
translation.zh: 好的 卢卡斯？真心话还是大冒险？

translation.en: -[Lucas] Okay, who's ready? -[all whooping]
Okay, guys, I promise you it's just because it's cold in here.
translation.zh: 各位 我向你们保证 纯粹是因为这里太冷了

translation.en: [Brad] I have no judgment.
translation.zh: 我没有评判任何人的意思

translation.en: -[Tyson] Scarred for life. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 这会成为我一辈子的阴影

translation.en: Hold your applause, please. Thank you.
translation.zh: 请大家先别鼓掌 谢谢

translation.en: -Quite the show. [laughs] -Thank you.
Okay, Markie's turn.
I got this one. Truth or dare?
translation.zh: 我来发问吧 真心话还是大冒险？

translation.en: Uh, truth.
Are you aware that Olivia is in love with your boyfriend?
translation.zh: 你是否有意识到 奥利维亚深爱着你男友？

translation.en: -[scoffs] No, she's not. -Come on, it's so obvious.
translation.zh: -她才没有 -拜托 这很明显

translation.en: Will you stop being such an asshole?
Just being truthful.
-Hey, Tyson, shut up! -Don't tell me to shut up.
translation.zh: -嘿 泰森 闭嘴吧！ -别叫我闭嘴

translation.en: What the hell is wrong with you?
Dude, we're all here because she's trying to make you jealous, clearly.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我们会来这里 是因为她想要让你感到妒忌

translation.en: Why are you always starting shit, dude?

Dare.
"Dare you to follow through with your promise.
translation.zh: “接受挑战完成你承诺过的事”

translation.en: Break Olivia's hand."
Obviously, this was you.
Do you see me texting you right now?
translation.zh: 你有看到我此刻发短信给你吗？

translation.en: No, but you were the only one there when I said that.
translation.zh: 没有 但你是唯一听到我这么说的人

translation.en: Markie, why would I dare you
translation.zh: 玛琪 我为何要挑战你 打断我自己的手？

translation.en: -to break my own hand? -I don't know!
translation.zh: 玛琪 我为何要挑战你 打断我自己的手？ 我不知道！

translation.en: Maybe you're making a new YouTube video on how to lose friends.
translation.zh: 你或许在拍摄新的视频 教导人们如何失去朋友

translation.en: That seems even less likely.
[Markie] What are you doing?
You have to do it.
What?
You have to.
Ronnie didn't do his dare, and now he's dead.
translation.zh: 罗尼没有履行挑战所以死了

translation.en: Liv, this is so messed up.
translation.zh: 奥利维亚 这太荒谬了

translation.en: Even by my standards.
Look, as pissed as I am at you right now, and I'm so pissed,
translation.zh: 我此刻确实很生你的气 快气疯了…

translation.en: there's no way I'm gonna break your hand.
translation.zh: 但我绝对不会打断你的手

translation.en: Well, you don't really have a choice.
[breath trembling] So just take it. Please.
Markie, I don't wanna find out what happens if you don't.
translation.zh: 玛琪 我不想看到 你会遭受什么样的后果

translation.en: [exhales heavily] Just do it.
No. I can't.
God, just trust me, Markie. Do it. Please.
translation.zh: 天啊 相信我 玛琪 求求你快动手

translation.en: Don't tell me you're a fucking coward like your dad!
translation.zh: 别告诉我你也跟你父亲一样懦弱！

translation.en: -[screams] -Oh, shit.
Oh, my God.
-[Olivia whimpering] -I'll get some ice.
I can't deal with this crazy right now. I got a med school interview tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我看不下去了 我明天还有医学院的面试

translation.en: See a doctor!
-I'm sorry! Sorry! -Guys!
-[Olivia] Oh, God. -We gotta go to the hospital, okay?
translation.zh: -天啊 -奥利维亚 你得去医院 知道吗？

translation.en: -Come on. -Okay.
[Brad] You believe all this?
I don't know what to believe.
Come on.
Come on.
[distorted voice] Brad...
Truth or dare?
Brad...
-[screaming] -Truth!
[Officer Chang] Brad?
Hey. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 嘿 你怎么会在这里？

translation.en: Uh, my job. Why are you here?
translation.zh: 我在办事 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Friend of mine got hurt. It's nothing serious.
translation.zh: 我的朋友受伤了 但没什么大碍

translation.en: I'm just here for moral support.
translation.zh: 我只是来给予精神上的支持

translation.en: [Officer Chang] Something wrong?
Yeah, no, I'm just a little shaken up.
translation.zh: 没什么 我只是有点难过

translation.en: You haven't come by to see your mother in a few weeks.
translation.zh: 你已有几个星期没来看你母亲了

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I'm sorry.
I thought I was paying for this school so you could come home every once in a while.
translation.zh: 我以为支付这所大学的学费 是因为你能经常回家

translation.en: I know. I know. I just...
Things have been a little crazy lately.
You know, I don't wanna hear excuses, son.
translation.zh: 你知道我不喜欢听借口 儿子

translation.en: [in distorted voice] I want the truth.
There goes another $1,000 in credit card debt.
translation.zh: 我的信用卡债又多了一千块

translation.en: Oh, my God, Liv.
I just had my turn.
What?
The game, it made me, uh... It made me come out to my father.
translation.zh: 那个游戏逼我对父亲坦诚性取向

translation.en: What... Are you okay?
Yeah. Yeah. Yeah.
For the first time in my life, I told him my truth,
translation.zh: 我这辈子第一次 对他说出我内心的秘密…

translation.en: and I stood up to him and I feel... I feel awesome.
translation.zh: 我还与他对抗 这感觉棒极了

translation.en: Okay, hold on. Your dad didn't know that you were gay?
translation.zh: 等等 你父亲不知道你是同性恋？

translation.en: Your ringtone's Beyoncé.
translation.zh: 你的手机铃声是碧昂斯的歌

translation.en: Everyone loves Beyoncé.
Tyson's next.
[secretary] Will do.
Tyson Curran?
Let's do this.
Right this way.
So you come from a family of doctors, then?
Yes, ma'am. Mother, father, sister, uncle, and grandfather.
translation.zh: 是的 女士 我的父母 姐姐、叔叔和祖父

translation.en: Pretty much everybody.
[chuckles] Well, they must have set a great example for you to want to take the same route.
translation.zh: 他们肯定为你做了好榜样 指引你选择同样的道路

translation.en: Yes, absolutely, Dean Spencer.
translation.zh: 绝对是的 斯宾瑟院长

translation.en: Growing up, I would hear their stories about saving lives,
translation.zh: 我从小就听他们说 拯救他人性命的事迹…

translation.en: and I think... I think that somehow shaped me.
translation.zh: 我想那在无形中影响了我

translation.en: Pen! Where's Tyson?
His med school interview. Why?
translation.zh: 他去了医学院的面试 怎么了？

translation.en: You know,
I could do something self-serving, like become a hedge fund manager.
translation.zh: 我其实可以选择 为个人利益服务的行业 像是对冲基金经理

translation.en: The thing is, people need help, especially in times like these.
translation.zh: 但人们都需要帮助 尤其是现在这种危急时刻

translation.en: That's very noble of you.
You know, I just have one final question.
He hasn't had his turn yet.
Mr. Curran, your bag.
translation.zh: 柯伦先生 你的手提包

translation.en: Wait, Tyson, no! Wait, Tyson!
translation.zh: 等等 泰森 不要！

translation.en: Can I help you?
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare?
I'm sorry. I beg your pardon?
Truth or dare?
Truth, I guess.
Did my friends really put you up to this?
translation.zh: 是我朋友要你这么做的？

translation.en: How long have you been forging prescriptions?
translation.zh: 你伪造药物处方有多久了？

translation.en: I don't.
Did she actually tell you that?
[in normal voice] Excuse me?
I don't forge prescriptions. Why would you even ask me that?
translation.zh: 我没有伪造处方 你为何会这么问？

translation.en: [all] Ty! Ty!
[Olivia] Ty! Open the door!
Tyson?
-Tyson! -Are you okay?
-[Olivia] Open the door! -[Brad] Ty!
What are you doing?
Oh! Oh, my God! [screaming]
Oh, my God! Oh, my God! My God!
Tyson lied and then died because of it.
Just like Ronnie did when he didn't do the dare.
translation.zh: 跟罗尼没有履行挑战是一样的后果

translation.en: And my turn's next.
Yeah, pick truth.
translation.zh: 好的 选择真心话吧

translation.en: I mean, listen, we all should. Right?
translation.zh: 听着 我们都这么选 知道吗？

translation.en: Then whatever question that we get asked, we just answer it with 100% honesty.
translation.zh: 我们无论被问及任何问题都诚实作答

translation.en: Okay, that's how we're gonna survive till we figure this out.
translation.zh: 我们就这么办 直到想出解决办法

translation.en: We got it?
Only choose truth.
We need more vodka.
You need sleep.
Okay, I'll put her in bed.
translation.zh: 好的 我让她上床睡觉

translation.en: You guys find Carter.
He started all this. Maybe he can end it.
translation.zh: 这一切因他而起 他或许能够做个了断

translation.en: He said that he went to USC.
translation.zh: 他提过自己就读南加州大学

translation.en: Five Carters, none of them our guy.
translation.zh: 有五个卡特 但都不是我们要找的

translation.en: Maybe he meant the other USC?
translation.zh: 他或许指的是南卡罗来纳大学？

translation.en: All right, she's asleep. Did you find Carter yet?
translation.zh: 她睡着了 你们找到卡特了吗？

translation.en: No, dead end.
Did you try using Google?
translation.zh: 你们有尝试上网搜寻吗？

translation.en: Search "Mexico truth or dare."
translation.zh: 搜寻“墨西哥真心话大冒险”

translation.en: Uh, guys?
"Suspect Giselle Hammond, 22, an American college student
translation.zh: “嫌犯吉赛尔哈蒙德 是一名22岁的美国大学生…

translation.en: had gone missing while on spring break in Rosarito Beach.
translation.zh: 她来罗萨里托海滩 度春假后就失踪了”

translation.en: The clerk recounted Hammond's bizarre behavior before the incident,
translation.zh: “店员叙述哈蒙德 在事发前行为怪异…

translation.en: which is backed up with surveillance footage."
[Giselle] Pack of Morley's.
translation.zh: 给我一包默尔里牌香烟

translation.en: [Giselle] I don't wanna play anymore.
Dare.
[Giselle] I'm sorry. I don't have a choice.
-Holy shit. -[woman screaming]
[Lucas] Did they catch her?
Uh... No, it says there's still an ongoing search.
translation.zh: 没有 这里提到 他们仍在搜寻她的下落

translation.en: I just found her on Facebook.
translation.zh: 我找到她的脸书账号了

translation.en: What?
Oh, my God. It's him.
[Brad] Is he tagged?
No, I don't see him in any other photos.
translation.zh: 没有 但在其他照片里没有他

translation.en: Look at her wall. Maybe he posted.
translation.zh: 看一看她的留言区 他或许有留言

translation.en: [Olivia] Not that I see, but there's a bunch of posts
translation.zh: （去自首吧！你逃不了一世！） 我没看到他的留言 但这上面有很多…

translation.en: about people asking her to turn herself in.
Stuff like that.
Wait. Do you think she's checking this?
translation.zh: 等等 你说她是否有查看留言？

translation.en: -DM her. -Wait.
Just, uh, make a fake account. We don't want this shit traced to us.
translation.zh: 先注册一个虚构的账号 别让我们被查出

translation.en: Yeah.
So we're here on our first vacation together.
translation.zh: 这是我们首次一同度过的假期

translation.en: Is it our first vacation together?
translation.zh: 这是我们首次共度的假期吗？

translation.en: [Penelope] Um, there was that time you came and visited me and my family in Texas.
translation.zh: 你有一次到德州探望我和我的家人

translation.en: Right?
[Tyson] You're from Texas? I thought you're from Mexico.
translation.zh: 你来自德州？我以为你来自墨西哥

translation.en: [Penelope laughs] From Mexico?
Tyson!
We're playing the game, too.
We need your help.
Please meet me.
This woman is wanted for murder.
Do you really think she's gonna come out of hiding for "We need your help"?
translation.zh: 你真以为她会因为 你需要帮忙而露面？

translation.en: I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
translation.zh: 我知道这个游戏 挑战你在那女人身上点火

translation.en: Tell me where to meet you,
translation.zh: 告诉我去哪能和你会面…

translation.en: or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.zh: 否则我会守在你家人的屋外…

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them.
translation.zh: 直到游戏挑战我也对他们这样下手

translation.en: Markie, you cannot send that!
translation.zh: 玛琪 你不能发送这样的信息！

translation.en: If you want to live, you need to stop thinking about other people
translation.zh: 你若想活命就得停止顾及他人…

translation.en: and start thinking about yourself!
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, beautiful?
translation.zh: 真心话还是大冒险 美女？

translation.en: What?
Hard to make a decision without Tyson telling you what to do?
translation.zh: 少了泰森给你做主 你就不知所措？

translation.en: Screw you!
Truth.
Truth or dare?
I said truth!
Sorry, that's not how this game works.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这不是游戏的玩法

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
[Lucas] Be patient. She'll write back.
translation.zh: 耐心等待 她会回复的

translation.en: This is all my fault.
Hey, no, it's not.
No, she's right.
None of us wanted to follow that creep.
translation.zh: 我们没有一人想要跟那个变态走

translation.en: None of us wanted to play that stupid game.
translation.zh: 我们也没想要玩那个愚蠢的游戏

translation.en: The only reason I went on that trip was for you, remember?
translation.zh: 我会去那趟旅程的唯一原因 就是你 记得吗？

translation.en: You said you needed your best friend.
translation.zh: 你说过需要最好朋友的陪同

translation.en: -All right, come on, guys. -No, but now I realize
translation.zh: -够了 各位 -不 我现在意识到…

translation.en: it's not about friendship or "I choose you."
translation.zh: 这不关系到友情或 “我选择你”的情谊

translation.en: It's about me being there to cover your ass while you hooked up with randoms!
translation.zh: 你不过想要我帮你掩盖 好让你可以跟陌生人偷情！

translation.en: Hey.
Screw you, Olivia.
Was that necessary?
Guys, come outside! Now!
[Olivia] Pen! What are you doing?
I tried. It wouldn't let me pick truth.
translation.zh: 我尝试过了 但它不让我选择真心话

translation.en: I tried, I swear!
I have to walk the edge until I finish this!
translation.zh: 我必须走到屋顶的另一边 直到喝完这个为止！

translation.en: [Olivia] Pen, you're gonna be fine!
translation.zh: 佩内洛普 你不会有事的！

translation.en: Okay, just go slow. Take your time.
translation.zh: 好的 慢慢走 别着急

translation.en: -[Markie] Be careful! -[Lucas] Oh, jeez!
I'm gonna go up there. I'll try and grab her if she loses her balance.
translation.zh: 我要上去那里 她若站不稳 我可以接住她

translation.en: No, your hand's broken. I'll go.
translation.zh: 不 你的手受伤了 换我去吧

translation.en: Pen, just walk slowly, okay?
translation.zh: 佩内洛普 慢慢走 知道吗？

translation.en: Hey! Just take your time, okay?
-Walk slowly. It's gonna be fine. -[Brad] What do we do?
translation.zh: -慢慢走 没事的 -我们该怎么做？

translation.en: [Olivia] Be careful. It's gonna be okay.
-Okay. -[Brad] You're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 好的 你不会有事的

translation.en: We need to grab something in case she falls. Go inside.
translation.zh: 我们得找东西来垫底 以免她摔下来 进屋去

translation.en: I'm gonna clear a path.
[Brad] All right, let's go! Let's go!
-[yelps] -[Olivia] Pen!
Be careful!
You're good, okay?
[Markie] Hey, will this work?
What? Yeah. Yeah. Come on.
Just get under her. Get under her and follow her.
translation.zh: 去到她底下的位置 跟着她走

translation.en: -[Brad] Be careful, Pen. -[gasps]
[Markie] Go! Get back. Get back. Get back.
[Olivia] No need to rush.
[Olivia] It's okay. [Markie] It's okay, Pen.
translation.zh: 没事的 没事的 佩内洛普

translation.en: [Olivia] Just take your time. Take it slowly.
[Olivia] Okay, just put one foot in front of the other.
translation.zh: 佩内洛普 后脚跟着前脚

translation.en: [Olivia] Watch it, okay? Just go slow.
You can do this.
We're right here. We're here for you, okay?
translation.zh: 我们就在这里 知道吗？

translation.en: I see her. She's right there. Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 我看到她了 在那里 快去！

translation.en: Wait. She's on the corner.
[Brad] There she is.
Get that stuff out of the way!
[Lucas] Hey! Pen!
I'm coming! I'm coming!
No, no, no, don't get too close!
If I cheat, if I don't do the dare--
translation.zh: 我要是作弊 没有履行挑战的话…

translation.en: I know. I know. Okay?
But when you finish, I'll be here to grab you.
translation.zh: 但你完成后 我会在这里拉住你

translation.en: Just gotta go around this corner now, okay?
translation.zh: 你只要绕过房角就行了 知道吗？

translation.en: [Penelope] Okay.
[Olivia] Come on.
Take your time, okay?
You're doing great, Pen. Don't look down.
translation.zh: 你做得很好 佩内洛普 不要往下看

translation.en: -Stay here. Stay below her. -Okay.
translation.zh: -留在那里 在她底下 -好的

translation.en: Wait. Where are you going?
Hey, Pen, don't look at the fence. Okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 佩内洛普 别看栅门 知道吗？

translation.en: Look at me, okay? You're almost there. Just a little more.
translation.zh: 看着我 就快到了 还差一点点

translation.en: She's right above us. Throw it on top.
translation.zh: 她就在我们的上方 扔过去

translation.en: -You ready? -Yeah.
That's not gonna work.
That might.
-[Olivia grunts] -Oh! Hey! Penelope!
Shit.
-Guys, get back further. Get back! -Go, go, go.
translation.zh: -各位 往后退 快退！ -快啊 快退后

translation.en: One last sip.
[Lucas] No. Pen!
Hey! Pen! No! No!
-[Olivia] Pen! -[Markie] She's not moving. [panting]
translation.zh: 佩内洛普！ 她不动了

translation.en: Pen.
Is this my bed?
Let it out.
-You're okay. -[cell phone vibrating]
I just got a Facebook message from Giselle.
translation.zh: 吉赛尔刚在脸书上回复我

translation.en: We're sure this is a good idea, meeting her here?
What if the cops trace her message?
translation.zh: 万一她的信息被警方追踪了呢？

translation.en: No, she wrote us on a fake account.
translation.zh: 不会的 她是用虚构的账号回复我们

translation.en: Yeah, but that chick lit somebody on fire. She's probably nuts.
translation.zh: 但那女人在别人身上点火 她或许是个疯子

translation.en: [Markie] I mean, do we really have another choice?
We can talk about this inside. Come on.
Let's go.
Inside?
Okay, all right, that's far enough. Tell us what's happening.
translation.zh: 好的 这里够远了 告诉我们发生了什么事

translation.en: Which one of you's Olivia?
No, you answer our question first. How do you know Carter?
translation.zh: 不 你先回答我们 你是怎么认识卡特的？

translation.en: -Carter? -Cut the crap. We saw the photo.
translation.zh: -卡特？ -废话少说了 我们看到那张照片 是他带我们加入这个游戏的

translation.en: He's the one who brought us into this game.
translation.zh: 我们看到那张照片 是他带我们加入这个游戏的

translation.en: Yeah, right, okay. Carter, right.
Did he bring you into this, too?
No, he didn't. He didn't start this.
translation.zh: 不 这不是由他开始的

translation.en: He was just one of my friends.
translation.zh: 他只是我的其中一位朋友

translation.en: We all went on a trip to Mexico and got really wasted.
translation.zh: 我们一同到墨西哥 接着喝个烂醉

translation.en: We found this old church, and we decided to party in it,
translation.zh: 我们找到一所老旧的教堂 决定在那里开派对…

translation.en: and my roommate wanted to play truth or dare, so we did.
translation.zh: 我的室友想要玩真心话大冒险 我们于是开始玩

translation.en: But when we got home, the game, it just kept going.
translation.zh: 但我们回家后 游戏却继续进行

translation.en: My roommate died first, and then the other ones and--
translation.zh: 我室友最先死去 接着轮到其他人…

translation.en: How is this possible?
I wish I knew.
I thought this was some kind of karmic payback for Sam trashing the place, you know?
translation.zh: 我原先以为这是 山姆砸烂那地方的报应

translation.en: "Sam"?
Uh, yeah, Sam. He was one of my friends.
translation.zh: 对 山姆是我其中一位朋友

translation.en: He got really drunk, and he just started breaking stuff.
translation.zh: 他喝得很醉 接着开始把东西摔烂

translation.en: I don't know. We were all being idiots. I don't...
translation.zh: 我不知道 我们全都在闹着玩…

translation.en: Our friend just had a turn in the game.
translation.zh: 游戏刚刚轮到我们的朋友

translation.en: It wouldn't let her pick truth. Do you know why?
translation.zh: 但却不让她选择“真心话” 你知道为什么吗？

translation.en: It's how we played. We called it "two truths and a dare."
translation.zh: 这是我们的玩法 我们称作 “两次真心话一次挑战”

translation.en: If two people pick truth in a row, then the next person had to do a dare.
translation.zh: 若有两个人连续选择真心话 下一个人就得选择挑战

translation.en: Thought it was more fun that way.
translation.zh: 我们认为这样做会更有趣

translation.en: More fun?
Your asshole buddy gave us a death sentence.
translation.zh: 你那混蛋朋友给我们判了死刑

translation.en: Any more super dangerous rules you wanna tell us about?
translation.zh: 你还有其他危险的规则 要告诉我们吗？

translation.en: Easy, Pen.
translation.zh: 冷静下来 佩内洛普

translation.en: He told me he was dared to find a new group to play.
translation.zh: 他告诉我自己 被挑战寻找游戏的新组合

translation.en: And that it had to be at the mission. He didn't have a choice, you know?
translation.zh: 地点一定要在教堂 他别无选择

translation.en: Of course he did.
Okay, so where is Carter now?
translation.zh: 好吧 卡特现在人呢？

translation.en: I haven't talked to him since he went back to Mexico.
translation.zh: 他自从回去墨西哥后 我就没再跟他联络

translation.en: I thought that when he got a new group to play, that we would be out.
translation.zh: 我以为他既然找到了新的组合 我们就无需再参与游戏

translation.en: I can't believe he only got five of you to play.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信他只找来你们五个人

translation.en: If he would've gotten more,
then I would've had a longer time before I had to go again.
translation.zh: 就会有更长时间才会再次轮到我

translation.en: You got another turn?
Okay. It's time to go, guys.
translation.zh: 好了 我们到时间走了 各位

translation.en: Is this why you're telling us the truth?
translation.zh: 你是因为这个游戏 才告诉我们真心话？

translation.en: No. I, uh... I picked dare.
translation.zh: 不 我选择的是“大冒险”

translation.en: Markie's right. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 玛琪说得对 我们快离开这里吧

translation.en: Okay, we're leaving. Come on, Olivia.
translation.zh: 好的 我们走吧 奥利维亚

translation.en: I am so sorry, Olivia.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 奥利维亚

translation.en: How did you know my name when I got here?
translation.zh: 我们一来到这里时 你怎么会知道我的名字？

translation.en: I didn't put it in the message.
-No! -[Olivia screams]
-[Lucas] No! -[Markie] Pen!
Brad! No! No!
-Hold her down! -I have to kill Olivia!
translation.zh: -快按住她！ -我得杀掉奥利维亚！

translation.en: [Lucas] Stop moving.
[Brad] What the...
[Lucas] No! No!
No, no!
[Brad] Oh, shit.
What was she thinking?
It wasn't her.
Something took over like she was possessed.
translation.zh: 像是有东西附在她体内

translation.en: She didn't finish her dare.
Like Ronnie. This is what happens.
translation.zh: 跟罗尼一样 这就是后果

translation.en: So what do we do?
We tell the truth.
[Olivia] She was erratic, said she had to kill me.
translation.zh: 她的情绪很不稳定 还说必须得杀掉我 （柯尼斯警探）

translation.en: Then Penelope pushed me out of the way.
She shot her and then turned the gun on herself.
translation.zh: 被她射中 她接着朝自己开抢

translation.en: Were you aware that Giselle Hammond was wanted for murder?
translation.zh: 你是否知道吉赛尔哈蒙德 是被通缉的杀人犯？

translation.en: Yes.
Yeah, we thought that she knew someone that we were looking for.
translation.zh: 我们以为她会认识我们要找的人

translation.en: A guy that we met in Mexico, his name was Carter.
translation.zh: 我们在墨西哥时结交了一个 叫做卡特的人

translation.en: You don't know his last name?
No.
Any of these people look like him?
translation.zh: 这里头有长得像他的人吗？

translation.en: No, who are they?
translation.zh: 没有 他们是什么人？

translation.en: Five of Giselle Hammond's friends.
translation.zh: 吉赛尔哈蒙德的五位朋友

translation.en: All deceased.
Three suicides, two accidental deaths. All in three weeks.
translation.zh: 有三个自杀、两个发生致命意外 全都在三周内发生

translation.en: And now you've lost two friends.
translation.zh: 你现在也失去了两位朋友

translation.en: I don't believe in coincidences, Olivia.
translation.zh: 我不相信这是巧合 奥利维亚

translation.en: I think this is all connected. If you know how, you need to tell me.
translation.zh: 这一切都有关联 你若知道就得告诉我

translation.en: No, I promise.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 我全不知情

translation.en: If I did know, I would.
translation.zh: 我要是知道肯定会告诉你

translation.en: I hope so.
We'll be in touch.
Don't take any more vacations.
That did not go well.
translation.zh: 那进行的没有想象中顺利

translation.en: [Lucas] We told them the truth.
translation.zh: 我们把真相告诉了警方

translation.en: -As much as we could. -Guys,
the cops should be the least of our concerns.
translation.zh: 警方是我们此刻最无需操心的

translation.en: I mean, Penelope's dead, and Giselle gave us nothing.
translation.zh: 佩内洛普死了 吉赛尔也没供出什么

translation.en: She did say a new game had to start at the mission.
translation.zh: 她有提到必须在教堂内 才能开始新的游戏

translation.en: That place has to be the key.
translation.zh: 那个地方肯定是一切的根源

translation.en: [Officer Chang] Brad.
[sighs] Catch up with you guys later.
No, we shouldn't split up.
translation.zh: 不行 我们不能分散

translation.en: No, it's okay. My turn's not for a while.
translation.zh: 没关系 还有一阵子才轮到我

translation.en: I'll deal with my father. You deal with finding the mission.
translation.zh: 我先去应付我父亲 你们去找有关教堂的资料

translation.en: Come on.
I think it was built in 1896.
Yeah, that really narrows it down.
It's a start.
Oh, shit. I gotta grab my charger.
translation.zh: 该死的 我得去拿充电器

translation.en: I think you left your bag in my room.
translation.zh: 你好像把手提袋落在我房间了

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -What?
Check this out.
It says there was a massacre a few weeks later.
translation.zh: 这里提到在几周后发生了大屠杀

translation.en: "Only one survivor lives in the area. Inez Reyes, 19."
translation.zh: 只有一名生还者 是住在同区19岁的伊内斯雷耶斯

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Truth or dare.
translation.zh: 真心话… 还是大冒险？

translation.en: Where is she? Liv!
Hey! Hey!
[Markie] Olivia! Are you okay?
Where am I?
-Where am I? -What the hell are you...
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Are you okay?
Was that your turn?
[Lucas] Hey! Hey! Come back! Come back!
Olivia, what did he say?
translation.zh: 奥利维亚 他说了什么？

translation.en: He dared me to sleep with Lucas.
translation.zh: 他挑战我跟卢卡斯上床

translation.en: Why would you pick dare?
Because of what Giselle said.
If I picked truth,
I was just forcing someone else to pick dare.
translation.zh: 就是强迫他人选择大冒险

translation.en: How noble.
Markie, I didn't know that's what it would ask.
translation.zh: 玛琪 我并不知道会是这样

translation.en: I don't think he knew where he was.
translation.zh: 他好像不知道自己身在何处

translation.en: -Are you guys okay? -Yeah, I'm perfect.
Well, hey, hey! Where are you going?
Anywhere but here.
What is going on?
Why don't you ask Olivia?
Will you please tell me what the hell is going on?
translation.zh: 能请你告诉我到底发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: I got my turn.
Yeah, and?
Whoa. Hey, no. What are we doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 不 我们在做什么？

translation.en: Oh, this is the dare.
translation.zh: 哦 这就是你的挑战

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Why didn't you pick truth?
I told Markie it was so that you guys wouldn't have to,
translation.zh: 我告诉玛琪我是为了你们着想…

translation.en: but that was a lie.
I chose dare because there is something that I can never tell Markie,
translation.zh: 我选择大冒险是因为 我有件事绝对不能告诉玛琪…

translation.en: and I'm really afraid the game's gonna make me do it.
translation.zh: 我很害怕这个游戏会逼我说出口

translation.en: It can't be that bad.
You have no idea.
-[grunts] -What?
No, you're just doing this because of the dare.
translation.zh: 不 你只是为了履行挑战

translation.en: Because you have to.
No, you have to.
translation.zh: 不 是你必须这么做

translation.en: I don't.
[in distorted voice] Look at me.
Truth or dare?
Truth or dare?
[choking] Truth!
Who are you truly in love with?
I care about you. I do.
I'm in love with Markie.
Liv, I'm sorry. It was the game.
translation.zh: 奥利维亚 我很抱歉 这是游戏的一部分

translation.en: No, it was the truth.
translation.zh: 不 这是你的真心话

translation.en: [Markie on video] Roy Cameron, 45 years old, attempts to make dinner.
translation.zh: 罗伊卡梅伦 45岁 尝试做晚餐

translation.en: Take one.
Whoa. A little faith, please?
Nobody makes a steak like your old man.
translation.zh: 没人能跟你老爸一样做出美味的牛排

translation.en: [Markie] Wait. Dad, I'm pescatarian now.
translation.zh: 等等 爸爸 我现在只吃海鲜

translation.en: I know, honey.
Dad?
I miss you so much.
I miss you, too.
There's something that I've been dying to ask you.
No.
-She's not answering. -[Lucas] Wait.
Come here. Look at this.
There's no number, but she lives in Tijuana.
translation.zh: 这上面没有电话号码 但她住在蒂华纳

translation.en: That's less than three hours away.
Who is she?
She's someone who might be able to help us.
Come on.
[Roy in distorted voice] Come on, sweetheart.
Time to pick.
Truth.
The gun I used to kill myself,
why do you keep it?
Sometimes, I think about using it.
translation.zh: 我有时候会想要拿来用

translation.en: Maybe you should get it.
[Lucas] I'm worried about Markie.
I wish we would have found her before we left.
translation.zh: 真希望我们在离开前找到她

translation.en: Well, she doesn't want to speak to me right now, so there's nothing we can do.
translation.zh: 她现在不想跟我说话 我们也没办法

translation.en: You know that secret that you're keeping from her?
translation.zh: 你对她隐瞒的那个秘密…

translation.en: Maybe if you got it out, the game couldn't use it against you.
translation.zh: 你或许对她坦诚 游戏就不能用来威胁你

translation.en: No, no one can ever know.
translation.zh: 不 这件事没人能知道

translation.en: Especially not Markie. It would kill her.
translation.zh: 尤其是玛琪 她肯定会承受不了

translation.en: I'll try her again when we get there.
translation.zh: 我们抵达后我会再尝试打给她

translation.en: -Um... -[in English] Can I help you?
Sorry. Um, we're looking for Inez Reyes.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们找伊内斯雷耶斯

translation.en: She's my grandmother. I watch after her.
translation.zh: 她是我奶奶 我在照顾她

translation.en: We were just wondering if we could speak to her.
She speaks to no one.
No, please.
Our friends are dying, just like hers did. We just need a few words.
translation.zh: 我们跟她一样 身边的朋友都快死了 我们只需跟她说几句话

translation.en: I will ask.
And if you could show her this.
Show her that we were at this mission
translation.zh: 告诉她我们曾去过这个教堂…

translation.en: and that half the people in this photo are now dead.
translation.zh: 这照片中有一半的人已经死了

translation.en: Then maybe she'll talk to us.
translation.zh: 她或许会愿意跟我们谈谈

translation.en: She might see you. But she will not speak to you.
translation.zh: 她或许会见你们 但她不会跟你们说话

translation.en: She has not said a word in 50 years.
translation.zh: 她已有五十年没有说过一句话

translation.en: Wait here.
She must have taken a vow of silence, right?
translation.zh: 她肯定是禁言了 对吗？

translation.en: She was 19 when her friends were butchered. Imagine what that did to her.
translation.zh: 她朋友被屠杀时她才19岁 试想看这对她的打击有多大

translation.en: I don't have to.
It's been over an hour.
Yeah, for someone who doesn't speak, they seem to be doing a lot of talking.
translation.zh: 对一个不说话的人而言 她们之间似乎有很多话要说

translation.en: She will see you.
I'm sorry for the wait.
She has written something for you.
translation.zh: 她写了一些字条给你们

translation.en: What is it?
[girl] She would not let me read it.
[in English] Thank you for seeing us, Ms. Reyes.
translation.zh: 谢谢你愿意见我们 雷耶斯女士

translation.en: "The mission was a convent where young women went to find God.
translation.zh: “那教堂是一所修道院 让年轻女子能去向上帝祷告

translation.en: We were girls, so we played silly games like hide-and-seek.
translation.zh: 我们只不过是小女孩 会玩一些无聊的游戏… 像是抓迷藏

translation.en: But the priest who ran the convent forced us to play his own game.
translation.zh: 但管理教堂的牧师却强迫 我们玩他自创的游戏

translation.en: He let us hide, but then he took the one he found.
translation.zh: 他会让我们躲起来 只带走被他找到的那一个

translation.en: His pleasure was our pain.
translation.zh: 他的快乐建立在我们的痛苦之上

translation.en: We suffered in silence.
Then one of the girls told a secret.
translation.zh: 直到其中一个女孩说出了一个秘密

translation.en: She knew spells that could call spirits,
translation.zh: 她懂得如何用咒语召唤灵魂…

translation.en: so she summoned a demon named Calux.
translation.zh: 于是召唤了一个名叫卡吕的恶魔

translation.en: He possessed our game."
Possessed the game?
"Demons possess people, places,
objects, even ideas."
"Calux is a trickster.
That night, when the priest found his victim,
translation.zh: 那天晚上 当牧师找到他的受害者时…

translation.en: she was possessed by Calux.
She hid the priest's body in the mission
translation.zh: 她把牧师的尸体藏在教堂内…

translation.en: in pieces.
It took them a week to find his head.
translation.zh: 他们花了足足一周才找到他的头颅

translation.en: But Calux didn't want to stop. He made us keep playing.
translation.zh: 但卡吕不愿停止游戏 他强迫我们继续玩下去

translation.en: Many of my sisters died."
Wait. How did you and the others escape?
translation.zh: 等等 你和其他人是如何逃脱的？

translation.en: "The person who released the demon
can trap it with a simple ritual.
translation.zh: 可以通过一个简单的仪式把恶魔困住

translation.en: But only by his own hand."
translation.zh: 但必须自己亲手这么做”

translation.en: Uh... This is the spell?
It's in Spanish.
"The spell must be repeated seven times,
and a sacrifice must be placed in a pot sealed with wax.
translation.zh: 把牺牲品放入罐子用蜡封起来

translation.en: As long as the pot stays sealed in the mission,
translation.zh: 只要罐子被封死在教堂内…

translation.en: the door we opened for Calux will also be sealed."
translation.zh: 我们为卡吕所开的大门也会被关闭”

translation.en: Wait. I've seen that pot before.
translation.zh: 等等 我见过这个罐子

translation.en: [gasps] Yeah.
Look. When I saw it, it was broken,
translation.zh: 看看这个 但我看见时 罐子已经摔破了…

translation.en: and there was something inside it, and it smelled rotten.
translation.zh: 里头有一团东西… 闻起来像是腐烂了

translation.en: "Whoever broke the pot will have to do the same."
translation.zh: “打破罐子的人也必须这么做”

translation.en: What was it?
The sacrifice?
It was you who summoned the demon?
It's been a few years since AP Spanish, but I think it says,
translation.zh: 我在高中有修过西班牙语 这里说的好像是…

translation.en: "I have called upon an evil.
Silence my voice so the evil is no more."
translation.zh: 让我通过禁言来驱魔吧”

translation.en: So when Carter and his friends broke the pot at the mission--
translation.zh: 所以说卡特和他的朋友 在教堂摔破罐子…

translation.en: The demon was freed and possessed their game of truth or dare.
translation.zh: 释放出恶魔并附身于 他们当时玩的真心话大冒险游戏

translation.en: And we have to find whoever broke that pot.
translation.zh: 我们得找出是谁摔破那个罐子

translation.en: Giselle said somebody named Sam trashed the place.
translation.zh: 吉赛尔有提到是山姆把那地方砸烂了

translation.en: Yeah, and we have no idea who Sam is.
translation.zh: 我们根本不知道山姆是谁

translation.en: Or if he's even still alive.
translation.zh: 也不知道他是否还活着

translation.en: And if we do find him...
translation.zh: 我们就算找到他又能如何…

translation.en: What? "Hi, Sam, do you mind cutting out your tongue
translation.zh: 难道对他说：“嗨 山姆 你不介意割掉舌头…

translation.en: and sealing it in this lovely handmade pot?"
translation.zh: 再封死在这个漂亮的 手工罐子里吧？”

translation.en: I'll check Giselle's Facebook again, see if there's a Sam tagged.
translation.zh: 我再去查看吉赛尔的脸书 看是否能找出山姆

translation.en: Still nothing from Markie?
translation.zh: 还是没有玛琪的消息吗？

translation.en: She's ignoring all my texts.
Her turn is next. I'm gonna try calling her again.
translation.zh: 下一个就轮到她 我再尝试打给她

translation.en: [Officer Chang] Brad?
-Brad! It's your father. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 布拉德！ 我是你父亲

translation.en: Since Penelope, he's been...
translation.zh: 自从佩内洛普死后 他就一直…

translation.en: I'll get rid of him.
Let's talk outside.
[Officer] I'm gonna grab a coffee.
Look, uh, I'm hearing some things about your friend's murder.
translation.zh: 听着 我打听到 你朋友被谋杀的一些消息

translation.en: Kranis in homicide isn't convinced it's so simple.
translation.zh: 重案组的柯尼斯 很肯定事情没这么简单

translation.en: I know I don't need to ask this, but...
translation.zh: 我知道我无需这么问你 但是…

translation.en: Is there something you're not telling us?
No, I promise. Everything we told you was true.
translation.zh: 没有 我们对你说的全都属实

translation.en: Markie, thank God!
Why are you telling me all this?
'Cause I know Kranis is wrong,
translation.zh: 因为我知道柯尼斯错了…

translation.en: and I want you to know what's going on.
translation.zh: 我想让你知道此刻的状况

translation.en: Look, you don't have to worry.
I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
You're still my son, Brad.
translation.zh: 你仍然是我儿子 布拉德

translation.en: You gonna get that?
Get what?
[voice on radio] Truth or dare, Brad?
translation.zh: 真心话还是大冒险 布拉德？

translation.en: [Markie] Yeah, I guess I just needed some time alone.
No, no, no. It's fine.
Just get here as fast as you can. And please be careful.
translation.zh: 你尽快来这里吧 路上小心

translation.en: Your turn's next.
I had my turn.
I chose truth.
So did Lucas.
And if the both of you picked truth...
translation.zh: 你们两人若都选择了真心话…

translation.en: [voice] You only have one choice.
You sure there's nothing you didn't tell me?
translation.zh: 你确定没有事要告诉我？

translation.en: I dare you to steal his gun
and make him beg for his life.
translation.zh: 让他跪地求饶 求你饶过他一命

translation.en: Son?
Thank you, Dad,
for everything.
It's just, uh...
There's just one more thing I need to do, and I hope you can forgive me.
translation.zh: 我还得做一件事 我希望你能够原谅我

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course.
For what?
It's okay.
I need you to beg.
-For your life. -The hell are you doing?
translation.zh: -求我饶你一命 -你这是在搞什么？

translation.en: [Brad] Beg for your life!
Brad, please put the gun down!
-Just do as I say... -You don't have to do this.
translation.zh: -你就照着我说的… -你无需这么做

translation.en: ...or I'll die. Get on your knees.
We have to go. Now!
Do as I say. I'll explain everything, okay?
translation.zh: 照着我说的 我会向你解释一切 好吗？

translation.en: -I know I've been hard on you. I'm sorry. -Listen. No!
translation.zh: -我知道我对你太严格了 我很抱歉 -不！听我说

translation.en: That's not what this is about.
Beg! Please, I'll explain everything. Just beg.
translation.zh: 快求我！拜托你 我会向你解释一切的 快求我吧

translation.en: I guess you think I deserve this.
translation.zh: 你或许认为这是我咎由自取

translation.en: No! No.
Just beg!
Please! Just beg, and I'll put down the gun.
translation.zh: 拜托你！快求我 我就会把枪放下

translation.en: -What's that gonna prove, Brad? -Just beg!
translation.zh: -那样做能证明些什么 布拉德？ -快求我！

translation.en: And I'll put down the gun! -Beg-- -[gun fires]
translation.zh: 我就会把枪放下！快求我！

translation.en: No, no! No!
[Olivia] Brad!
Brad, no, no, no. No!
[Olivia] No! No!
Get a paramedic.
Come on.
Brad! Brad! No, no, no.
Stay here. You're gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 保持清醒 你不会有事的

translation.en: No! No!
I need a paramedic. Help!
translation.zh: 我需要救护人员 救命啊！

translation.en: I need a paramedic! Brad!
translation.zh: 我需要救护人员！布拉德！

translation.en: [Markie] I'm so sorry.
Guys, can we get out of here?
translation.zh: 各位 我们能离开这里吗？

translation.en: I still need to talk to the detective.
translation.zh: 我还需要跟那名警探谈一谈

translation.en: -I shouldn't have picked truth. -[Lucas] No.
It's not your fault. I picked truth, too.
translation.zh: 这不是你的错 我也选择了真心话

translation.en: We shouldn't have left Brad alone.
translation.zh: 我们不该让布拉德单独一人

translation.en: No, it wouldn't have mattered.
translation.zh: 不 这不会改变什么

translation.en: This game is smart. It's too smart. We're not playing it.
translation.zh: 这游戏太聪明了 不是我们在玩它

translation.en: It's playing us. And none of this is a coincidence.
translation.zh: 是它在玩我们 这一切都不是巧合

translation.en: It waits for our most vulnerable moments, and that's when it asks us.
translation.zh: 它等到我们最脆弱的时刻才发问

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Yeah, you got that right, Olivia.
translation.zh: 你说得没错 奥利维亚

translation.en: And now it's your turn.
Truth or dare?
What?
What is it?
Lucas just asked me.
translation.zh: 卢卡斯刚刚向我发问了

translation.en: [in normal voice] No, I didn't.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Olivia?
translation.zh: 真心话还是大冒险 奥利维亚？

translation.en: [Markie] Okay.
Okay, you have to pick truth.
Olivia, do it.
-Dare. -[Markie] Olivia.
I dare you
to tell Markie the secret you fear most.
translation.zh: 告诉玛琪你最害怕的秘密

translation.en: What? What is it making you do?
Markie, there's something important I need to tell you.
translation.zh: 玛琪 我有一件很重要的事得告诉你

translation.en: [whispers] What?
I was there the night your dad died. I know what happened.
translation.zh: 你父亲死去的那晚我也在场 我知道发生了什么事

translation.en: What?
What are you talking about?
I had gotten into a fight with my parents, so I went to your house.
translation.zh: 我那晚跟父母吵架 于是到你家去找你

translation.en: You weren't there, so your dad let me in.
translation.zh: 你当时不在家 你父亲开门让我进去

translation.en: He was drinking, and he offered me one, so I took it.
translation.zh: 他在喝酒 也倒了一杯给我… 我接受了

translation.en: We had a few, and then he told me that he had been fired that day
translation.zh: 我们喝了几杯后 他告诉我他当天被解雇了…

translation.en: 'cause he was drinking on the job.
And I just... I felt really bad for him. [sniffles]
But I told him that you and I would help him figure things out.
translation.zh: 我告诉他 我和你一定会帮助他渡过难关

translation.en: And then he called me beautiful.
translation.zh: 他接着告诉我 我很美

translation.en: I was drunk, and I didn't know what to do, and then he leaned in to kiss me...
translation.zh: 我当时喝醉了 不知道该怎么做… 他靠近想要亲吻我…

translation.en: I tried to push him off. I didn't do it, but he...
translation.zh: 我尝试推开他 但是…

translation.en: [sniffles] He kept coming back stronger.
translation.zh: 他的动作越来越有侵略性

translation.en: Finally, I got free.
He begged me to forgive him,
said that he needed help, but I was so scared,
translation.zh: 还说自己需要帮助 但我好害怕

translation.en: and I was confused.
And I threatened to tell you what happened,
translation.zh: 我威胁他要把这件事告诉你…

translation.en: but he said that he would die if you ever found out.
translation.zh: 他说自己宁愿死也不要让你知道

translation.en: I told him that you'd be better off if he were dead.
translation.zh: 我说他若死了反而是件好事

translation.en: Markie, I am so sorry.
I wanted to tell you, but by the time I got a hold of you,
translation.zh: 我很想把这件事告诉你 但我当时找到你时…

translation.en: he had already done it, and you were devastated.
translation.zh: 他已经自杀了 你伤心欲绝

translation.en: It broke my heart. I didn't know what to do. Trust me. I--
translation.zh: 我感到好难过 我不知道该怎么做 请你相信我…

translation.en: No.
No, I'll never trust you again.
translation.zh: 我永远都不会再相信你

translation.en: Markie.
Don't!
Don't.
[Kranis] Miss Barron,
you're up.
[Kranis] "I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
translation.zh: “我知道这个游戏 挑战你在那女人身上点火

translation.en: Tell me where to meet you, or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.zh: 告诉我去哪能和你会面 否则我会守在你家人的屋外…

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them."
translation.zh: 直到游戏挑战我也对他们这样下手”

translation.en: That is quite a threat.
We traced the IP to your laptop.
translation.zh: 我们查看网址追溯到你的笔记本电脑

translation.en: [stammers] I know that that looks bad,
translation.zh: 我知道这么做很不应该…

translation.en: but I just needed to get her attention.
translation.zh: 但我需要引起她的注意

translation.en: Yeah, I know you're playing some kind of truth or dare game,
translation.zh: 是的 我知道你们在玩某种 真心话大冒险的游戏…

translation.en: but what I don't understand is, why are people dying?
translation.zh: 但我不明白的是为何有人会死？

translation.en: There's only four of you left.
translation.zh: 现在只剩下你们四个人

translation.en: I'd like to keep the rest of you guys alive.
translation.zh: 我想尽力保住你们的性命

translation.en: Four?
Everyone who's dead was in Mexico.
translation.zh: 所有死去的人都曾去过墨西哥

translation.en: That leaves you, Markie and Lucas, and Giselle's friend, Sam Meehan.
translation.zh: 现在只剩下你、玛琪、卢卡斯 以及吉赛尔的朋友山姆米汉

translation.en: Sam?
Wait. He's alive?
You know him?
No.
No. [stammering]
That's just someone that Giselle had mentioned.
translation.zh: 我只是听吉赛尔提过这个名字

translation.en: He's holed up in an apartment. Won't talk to anybody.
translation.zh: 他把自己锁在一所公寓里 不愿与任何人交谈

translation.en: Said I had to arrest him if I wanted to speak to him again.
translation.zh: 他说我若想再跟他说话 就得正式拘捕他

translation.en: Olivia, what the hell is happening here?
translation.zh: 奥利维亚… 究竟发生了什么事？

translation.en: Could I get some water, please?
Thanks.
[Kranis] Officer, I need a glass of water.
translation.zh: 马克思 我需要一杯水

translation.en: -[camera clicks] -[woman] Yes, sir, right away.
translation.zh: 是的 长官 立刻送来

translation.en: Am I being charged?
Not yet.
Okay. Then I need to go.
Carter is Sam.
He was using a fake name.
But Giselle acted like they were different people?
translation.zh: 但吉赛尔为何假装他们不是同一人？

translation.en: Well, she was probably trying to protect him,
but she slipped up, and she used his real name. Come on.
translation.zh: 但她不小心说出他真实的名字 走吧

translation.en: Markie?
Markie?
Markie!
Markie, please open the door. We need to talk.
translation.zh: 玛琪 请你开门 我们需要谈谈

translation.en: What are you doing?
What my father did.
Markie, please put it down.
translation.zh: 玛琪 请你把枪放下

translation.en: [sobs] Why?
I don't have anything.
You have me.
No.
-No, the game has us. -[cocks gun]
translation.zh: 我们已经被这游戏摧毁了

translation.en: I hid the truth about your dad to protect you.
translation.zh: 我之所以对你隐瞒你父亲的事 是想保护你

translation.en: But I was wrong.
Every single day, I wish I could take back what I said to him.
translation.zh: 我每一天都希望 自己能收回对他说的那些话

translation.en: He tried before.
translation.zh: 他之前也尝试过要自杀

translation.en: It's not your fault.
We can't change the past.
But we can still have a future. We can end this game.
translation.zh: 但我们仍能把握未来 我们能了结这个游戏

translation.en: How?
Carter. I know where he is.
translation.zh: 通过卡特 我知道他在哪

translation.en: Okay, so what's the plan?
translation.zh: 好的 我们的计划是什么？

translation.en: We just have to get him back to the mission.
Okay, so don't open with, "We need you to cut out your own tongue"?
translation.zh: 那就别一开口就对他说： “我们需要你割下自己的舌头”？

translation.en: Here it is. Six.
[Carter] Go away! I don't wanna talk to anyone.
translation.zh: 走开 我不想跟任何人说话

translation.en: Screw this.
-You... -[Olivia] Carter!
Or is it Sam?
-How did you find me? -We were motivated.
translation.zh: 你们是如何找到我的？ 我们是被激发的

translation.en: -What the hell happened in here? -The game.
No contact with the outside.
Nothing in here can hurt me.
translation.zh: 这里没有什么能够伤害我

translation.en: This is your plan?
My plan is to wait it out.
No, that was your second plan.
translation.zh: 不 那是你的第二个计划

translation.en: Your first plan was to screw us.
translation.zh: 你的第一个计划是要拖累我们

translation.en: Three of my best friends are dead because of you!
translation.zh: 全都因为你 我的三个好友都死了！

translation.en: I'm sorry. I lost friends, too, okay?
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 我也失去了朋友 好吗？

translation.en: If I could take it all back, I would.
translation.zh: 我若能收回这一切 我会这么做

translation.en: There is a way.
But we all have to go back to the mission.
A way to what? To what, end the game? How?
translation.zh: 什么办法？能了结这个游戏吗？ 要怎么做？

translation.en: Just trust me.
We have to go back.
Uh-uh...
No, this is another dare, right?
translation.zh: 这是一个挑战 对吗？

translation.en: The game is daring you to lure me out.
translation.zh: 游戏在挑战你们把我引出去

translation.en: -Is that-- -No.
She's telling the truth.
And why should I trust you?
Because we want the same thing.
We wanna survive.
Look.
I'm gonna tell you what you should have told me at the bar.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你 你当初在酒吧应该对我说的话

translation.en: Piss off.
Okay, sweet, little Olivia's not shooting anyone.
translation.zh: 好的 甜美的奥利维亚才不会开枪

translation.en: Try me. I dare you.
translation.zh: 试试看吧 我挑战你试试看

translation.en: [Lucas] Come on. Let's go.
Is this ritual that old nun told you about actually gonna work?
translation.zh: 那个老修女说的仪式真的有效？

translation.en: [Olivia] There's only one way to find out.
translation.zh: 我们只有试过才会知道

translation.en: So we're gonna end this with a seance?
translation.zh: 我们得用降神术来了结这一切？

translation.en: [Olivia] We are not ending it.
translation.zh: 该了结这一切的人不是我们

translation.en: You are.
Me?
I tried.
[chuckles] We all know how that turned out.
-Stay down. -[coughs]
Here, take this. Take it.
Say it seven times.
What are you gonna do with that?
I'm giving it to you.
Take it now!
Now say the words seven times.
Go!
Did you feel that?
[Olivia] Don't stop.
-Just tell me what's going on! -Keep going!
translation.zh: 快告诉我这是怎么一回事？ 继续念！

translation.en: [Carter] All right. Uh, uh...
Say it again.
Five more times.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Lucas?
translation.zh: 真心话还是大冒险 卢卡斯？

translation.en: Dare.
-Where are you going? -Just gotta get away from here.
Wait, wait, wait!
You can't go. Your turn's next.
translation.zh: 你不能走 下一个就轮到你了

translation.en: I just had my turn.
-Gotta get away from you both. -Why?
Because it dared me to choose.
translation.zh: 它挑战我选择你们其中一人

translation.en: You already have. You love Markie!
translation.zh: 你已经做出了选择 你爱的是玛琪！

translation.en: Choose which one of you to kill.
translation.zh: 它是要我选择杀掉你们其中一人

translation.en: Luke.
What, so he's just leaving?
translation.zh: 什么 他就这样走掉？

translation.en: Don't stop. Two more times.
[Markie] Luke!
Luke!
Why did you pick dare?
Because I knew if I didn't, then one of you would have to.
translation.zh: 我若不这么选择 你们其中一人就得这么做

translation.en: And we're so close.
And I won't let the game kill you.
translation.zh: 我是不会让这游戏杀掉你的

translation.en: You're such an idiot.
What can I say?
You do that to me.
That's seven. We gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 七遍了 我们得离开这里

translation.en: This place is coming down.
No, there's one more thing to do.
translation.zh: 不 还得做一件事才行

translation.en: Pick up the knife.
I can't do it for you.
Pick it up!
And do what?
I'm so sorry, Sam.
But you unleashed this evil,
translation.zh: 但这股邪恶的力量 是你释放出的…

translation.en: which means you're the only one who can stop it.
translation.zh: 这意味着只有你一人才能阻止

translation.en: I need you to cut out your tongue.
translation.zh: 我需要你割下自己的舌头

translation.en: No! That's insane.
Please! It's the only way we survive.
translation.zh: 求求你！这是唯一能存活的办法

translation.en: You take care of each other.
translation.zh: 你们两人要好好照顾彼此

translation.en: No!
No. No, no, no.
No, no!
[Olivia] Do it.
Lucas, stop!
That's not Lucas.
Do it now, Carter!
-[rumbling] -Before it's too late.
Don't you wanna live?
You do not have a choice! Do it!
I can't believe I'm about to do this.
translation.zh: 我无法相信自己要这么做

translation.en: [in distorted voice] I will murder everyone you've ever known.
translation.zh: 我会杀死所有你认识的人

translation.en: No! They are not in this. It's just us!
translation.zh: 不！这不关他们的事 只牵涉到我们！

translation.en: You're right. But Lucas is.
translation.zh: 你说得对 但卢卡斯也被牵涉在内…

translation.en: And he didn't do his dare.
So now he dies.
Lucas refused his dare to save us.
translation.zh: 卢卡斯是为了救我们才没有履行挑战

translation.en: We have to finish this.
[Markie] Calux killed Carter. The spell won't work.
translation.zh: 卡特被卡吕杀了 咒语失效了

translation.en: No, we lost the second we started this game.
translation.zh: 不 我们一开始玩这个游戏 就已经输了

translation.en: The second we came here.
translation.zh: 我们一来到这里就注定会输

translation.en: Carter was dared to bring us here
translation.zh: 卡特被挑战把我们带来这里…

translation.en: because this is where you can add new people to the game.
translation.zh: 是因为在这里才能加入新的游戏成员

translation.en: I have an idea.
Your turn's next. When you're asked, I need you to pick dare.
translation.zh: 下一个轮到你 你被问及时 我需要你选择大冒险

translation.en: Why would I do that?
[Lucas, in distorted voice] Markie...
Truth or dare?
[sobbing] Now Lucas is asking me.
Pick dare.
But don't do it.
What? I'll die!
Markie,
I am so sorry for keeping that secret from you for so long.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉对你隐瞒那个秘密如此之久

translation.en: And I swear to you I will never ever keep anything from you again.
translation.zh: 我对你发誓我再也不会对你有所隐瞒

translation.en: But we survive this only if we trust each other.
translation.zh: 我们只有相信彼此才能存活

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Trust me.
[Lucas] You have to pick.
Dare.
I dare you to shoot Olivia.
translation.zh: 我挑战你对奥利维亚开枪

translation.en: He wants me to shoot you.
You gotta trust me, Markie. Don't do it.
translation.zh: 你得相信我 玛琪 不要这么做

translation.en: This is the only way to save us both.
translation.zh: 这是唯一能救活我们两人的办法

translation.en: Okay.
I trust you.
I won't do it.
No!
Dare complete, Calux.
Your turn.
Truth or dare?
[in distorted voice] I'm not in this game.
translation.zh: 我并没有参与这个游戏

translation.en: No, once you're asked, you're in.
translation.zh: 不 你一旦被问及就得加入游戏

translation.en: Those are the rules, right?
translation.zh: 这是游戏规则 不是吗？

translation.en: So truth or dare, asshole?
translation.zh: 真心话还是大冒险 混蛋？

translation.en: Truth.
How do we get out of this game alive?
translation.zh: 我们要如何才能活着离开这个游戏？

translation.en: You can't.
Carter was the only one who could stop this.
translation.zh: 卡特是唯一能阻止的人

translation.en: So now the game won't end until all the players are dead.
translation.zh: 这个游戏在所有成员死之前 是不会停止的

translation.en: And your turn's next.
Unless you find some new friends to play with.
translation.zh: 除非你找来新的朋友一同玩

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen, is it?
translation.zh: 但这不太可能 对吧？

translation.en: [in normal voice] Your arm.
I'm okay.
Well, did it work?
It's not over.
The game will never end, not as long as we're alive.
translation.zh: 这个游戏是不会结束的 除非我们全都死了

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm choosing you.
[Olivia on video] My friends and I went on a trip to Mexico for spring break.
translation.zh: 我和朋友们到了墨西哥度过春假

translation.en: We ended up in an old mission where we played a game of truth or dare.
translation.zh: 我们去了一所老旧的教堂 在那里玩起真心话大冒险

translation.en: We had no idea that we had encountered an unspeakable evil
translation.zh: 我们并不知道自己遭遇了 可怕的邪恶力量…

translation.en: that wanted to play with us.
translation.zh: 它也想跟我们一同玩这个游戏

translation.en: When we went home, the game kept going.
translation.zh: 我们回到家后却发现游戏仍在进行

translation.en: It killed five of my friends.
translation.zh: 我有五个朋友已经被杀死了

translation.en: The game is real.
Tell the truth, do the dare, or you die.
translation.zh: 你得说出真心话 并履行挑战否则就会死

translation.en: Refuse to play, you die.
It can happen anywhere.
translation.zh: 在任何地方都可能发生

translation.en: And it can come from anyone.
I'm so sorry, but I have to ask you.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 但我必须问你

translation.en: Truth or dare?
translation.zh: （真心话大冒险咒语） 真心话还是大冒险？
